author: Duplicate Marco
post_text: April 4, 2015 at 1:48 PM#1Hi colleaguesSorry Guys for my Bad english.i looking for a Cmd Syntax for Rate1.If i write in the Cmd "Rate1" Rate1 is 1 the Fader is on 50%.What is the Syntax for Rate1 at 15 for example.Thanks for Answer.Happy Eastern from Switzerland

posts.author: Duplicate Marco
posts.post_text: April 4, 2015 at 1:48 PM#1Hi colleaguesSorry Guys for my Bad english.i looking for a Cmd Syntax for Rate1.If i write in the Cmd "Rate1" Rate1 is 1 the Fader is on 50%.What is the Syntax for Rate1 at 15 for example.Thanks for Answer.Happy Eastern from Switzerland

posts.author: sebmdp
posts.post_text: April 16, 2015 at 7:30 PM#2Hello,The syntax is :CodeSpecialMaster 4.1 At 154 is to call the Rate Masters & 1 is for the first Rate MasterIf you type the command below in the command line you'll find all the masters IDCodeList SpecialMasterHope this help.Regards.S.D.

title: Rate1 by Cmd
